achievements.title: Company Web App Development with Multi-Server Architecture
achievements.description: Developed a web app for my company, featuring 4 servers and ensuring seamless communication between them. Leveraged 2 years of experience in the software industry, utilizing technologies such as Node.js, React.js, Python, and SQL to build and integrate the servers effectively

achievements.title: Technological Diversity
achievements.description: Mastered a diverse set of frontend and backend technologies, including Node.js, Python, and React, for full-stack development. This expertise extends to mobile app development for both Android and iOS platforms, gained through self-directed learning and practical application

achievements.title: Responsive Design Mastery
achievements.description: Developed expertise in responsive web design, delivering consistent and user-friendly experiences across diverse devices and screen sizes, all achieved through self-directed learning without formal coursework or guidance.

achievements.title: Problem-Solving Skills
achievements.description: Built strong problem-solving skills by tackling development challenges independently, leveraging online resources, forums, and documentation to find effective solutions.

achievements.title: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA)
achievements.description: Studied Data Structures and Algorithms, successfully solving over 350 questions on LeetCode, showcasing a strong commitment to mastering algorithmic problem-solving.

achievements.title: Version Control Proficiency
achievements.description: Gained proficiency in using version control systems like Git to manage and track code changes, enabling effective collaboration and maintaining code integrity across personal projects.

achievements.title: Portfolio Development
achievements.description: Built a comprehensive portfolio showcasing a range of projects that highlight full-stack development, including mobile apps for Android and iOS, demonstrating practical skills and growth over time.

achievements.title: Community Involvement
achievements.description: Actively participated in online coding communities, forums, and open-source projects to learn from others, share knowledge, and contribute to the broader developer community.

achievements.title: Learning Agility
achievements.description: Showcased a strong ability to quickly adapt to new tools, libraries, and frameworks without formal education, highlighting a continuous commitment to staying up-to-date with industry trends

achievements.title: User-Centric Design
achievements.description: Focused on user-centric design principles in project development, aiming to create interfaces that improve user experience and usability, all achieved without formal design education.

achievements.title: Effective Time Management
achievements.description: Developed effective time management skills to balance learning, personal projects, and other commitments, demonstrating the ability to efficiently allocate time and resources.

achievements.title: Networking and Collaboration
achievements.description: Built connections within the developer community by networking, collaborating on open-source projects, and participating in relevant meetups and conferences.

achievements.title: Feedback Incorporation
achievements.description: Proactively sought feedback on personal projects and used it to iteratively enhance code quality, user interfaces, and overall project outcomes.
